AirBnbModel.source package¶

Module contents¶

Module that contains the neccesary scripts to extract different files from source database and load it into a staging database, so it can be preprocessed.

This module is part of the AirBnbModel package. For further information on the package, type:

>> help(AirBnbModel)

Submodules¶

AirBnbModel.source.run module¶

Contains the functions that define the execution of the ‘source’ task, which is responsible of extracting data from source database and loading it into a staging database, so it can be preprocessed.

Functions on this script must be called from run.py on main package folder.

Configuration parameters for this task can be found on configs/config.yml

AirBnbModel.source.run.predict()¶

Defines the execution of the ‘source’ task on predict mode.

This task extracts different tables containing new data loads it into a staging database, prior to its preprocessing.

AirBnbModel.source.run.train_eval()¶

Defines the execution of the ‘source’ task on train_eval mode.

This task extracts different tables containing training data and the target variable and loads it into a staging database, prior to its preprocessing.
